title: Font ID – Contemporary sans with sloped A and W?!!
content:
Hi there,

I'm new to this forum and hoped somebody would be able to identify the font in the attached pix?

Many thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316232922/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_54.jpg) | 4.93 KB |
| [Picture 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316232922/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_17.jpg) | 31.53 KB |
author: kellster

comments.content:
It's currently very very overused and thanks to games like Guitar Hero and Rockband, cheap amateur grungy versions of this font keep popping up on dafont and the like.

Please use sparingly, and only where necessary...

Contemporary - ha ha ha.

Nick Cooke

Nick, wasn't it Santayana who said "Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it"? That applies to fonts before our time.

- Mike Yanega
